field.name: summary
field.value: Wizard Crashes When Creating A New MonoRail Project

field.name: description
field.value:
When creating a new MonoRail project using the Visual Studio wizard (vs2005), I selected Brail, Routing Support, and TDD support and at the end, I got the following exception:
ArgumentException The reference node is no a child of this node. at System.Xml.XmlNode.InsertBefore at Castle.VSNetIntegration.CastleWizards.MonoRailProjectWizard.AddRoutingConfiguration at Castle.VSNetIntegration.CastleWizards.MonoRailProjectWizard.ProcessWebConfig

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Cannot Reproduce''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Release Candidate 3''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
